name: HellSpace
description:
Hellspace is a retro bullet-hell game inspired by Galaga and others. 

Instructions:

Move the mouse to move the player.

Left click to shoot.

Right click to use your laser (bomb) once you've bought charges,

Please feel free to join my discord server to leave feedback, or just comment here :)

discord: https://discord.gg/ka6YEbtSHc
